item.description:
THIS SESSION IS SOLD OUT!

 

Experience this total body "plateau proof fitness formula" workout, utilizing resistance and cardio training, which masterfully combines Resistance, Intervals, Power, Plyometrics, Endurance, and Diet components of R.I.P.P.E.D. to help you attain and maintain your physique in ways that are fun, safe, doable and extremely effective...

This is a 5 week Friday session that will run June 1, 2012 - June 29, 2012.

 

The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

56 Arbor St, Suite 103, Hartforf, CT 06106

(In the same building as Real Artways)

Bring Water, towel, sneakers, a yoga/pilates mat and a set of dumbell wieghts.  Depending on your experience with weights, bring, either 3, 5, 8, 10, or 15 lbs.  Err on the side of lighter weights if you are unsure.  You may also bring a resistance band.

The fee for the 5 weeks session is $25 and is non-refundable, and is due no later than the first day of the session.  The session is limited to 30 people.  Drop-ins are allowed if space is available.  The drop-in rate is $8.  You may also use 2 punches on your Creative Source Zumba Class card in lieu of the drop in fee.

Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same building as Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as The Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: R.I.P.P.E.D in Hartford CT IS SOLD OUT!
